## ggHydro

Ggplot convenient function for water resources systems analysis

## Installation

install directly from github using the devtools package. First install devtools,
instructions can be found here: https://github.com/hadley/devtools

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github('tanerumit/hydrosystems')
```


## Getting started

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(ggHydro)
```
